purpose: To provide a framework for building and managing swarms of AI agents for complex tasks and decentralized AI systems.
principle: Leverages multi-agent systems and decentralized AI principles to enable the coordination and interaction of multiple AI agents.
reusability: Offers a modular SDK with APIs for easy integration and customization, allowing developers to create and manage agent swarms.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited support for certain real-world applications and scalability challenges.
name: swarmzero
description: SwarmZero's SDK for building AI agents, swarms of agents and much more.
highlight: Facilitates the creation and coordination of swarms of AI agents for complex multi-agent systems.
